title: Floris
content:
Anybody knows another site option to buy Floris from Lucas De Groot.  
We can't buy online at lucasfonts.com, only by e-mail or phone.  
Thank you!  
E.
author: eliane

comments.content:
That seems to be the only way you can get that family. I suspect it's so they (he) can control who uses it. Other sites that carry Lucas Fonts do not include that family.

- Mike Yanega

Thank you, Mike.  
I suspect this is the reason. I already e-mailed them but still have no answer and I need it as soon as possible.  
Regards,  
E.
